body:
Easy

Mention the most awkward moment you've had in your life. 
I'll give it a start

My most awkward moment was when I jumped into a pool and slipped before I could :(

(INSPIRED BY CAMMY_G's WHEN I GET MOD)

title: Most awkward moment ever?..

replies.body:
Uh. This happened just today. I was going through airport security in landing, and I had my climbing pick in my carry on luggage. Since the airport near me is really lenient, they let me keep it on board with me.

However when I touched down, the security asked me to throw my pick away. I started to protest, whilst swinging my arms around with the pickaxe in my hand. Long story short, I got in deep trouble, made myself look like an idiot and scare everyone. I kept my pickaxe though!
